name: Incline Skull Crusher
how_to_perform:
# Start by adjusting an incline bench to a comfortable position, setting it on a weight rack or another stable platform.
## Lie back on the incline bench with your shoulders flat against the pad and your feet planted firmly on the ground. Adjust the bench so that your upper arms remain perpendicular to the floor throughout the exercise.
### Grip the barbell with an overhand grip, using hands shoulder-width apart. Hold the weight at arm's length across your chest.
## Slowly lower the bar down towards your forehead by bending both elbows in a shallow arc motion.
### Pause briefly once you reach the bottom of the movement.
## Using only your triceps to lift, push the barbell back up to the starting position, keeping your upper arms still and focusing on engaging your triceps throughout the exercise.
## Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: The Incline Skull Crusher is a variation of the traditional skull crusher that targets the upper arm muscles, particularly the triceps, while minimizing involvement from the shoulders and chest.
